title: Rafal Bojar
intro: My Experience, Awards & Pulications, and own vibes dor sure!
header: In March 2016, we launched our TV channel, VICELAND with all original content made by VICE. The network was a way for us to understand our world across a broad range of subjects, tones, and high and low cultures. Together with Gretel, we created a brand identity system with a functional aesthetic completely counter to any TV channel to date.
